Family tree: 580331591-1 Smart Matching 580331591-1 GEDCOM Source https://www.myheritage.com/person-1500259_144229541_144229541/georg... 3 Added by confirming a Smart Match Smart Matching 1:144229541-1-500259:0 Traveled with at least one of his sons, Jacob, on the ship "Richard and Mary" from Rotterdam, Holland. They docked in Philadelphia, Pennsylvannia in September, 1754 George Michael Wolfe was born on 29 Dec 1703 in Steinsfurt, Rhein-Neckar-Kreis, Baden-Wuerttemberg, Germany. He was the son of Hans Barnard Wolfe (1674-1756) and Susanna Ludwig Wolfe (1674-). George Michael married Elizabeth Rutter (1706-1756) in 1724 in Baden-Wuerttemberg, Germany. Elizabeth was the daughter of Conrad Rutter (1688-1769) and Catherine Lytle Rutter (1688-). George Michael and Elizabeth Rutter Wolfe were the parents of the following 11 known children: John Nicholas Wolf - M - 1730 in Germany; Michael Wolf - M - 1731 in Germany; Lewis Wolfe - M - 1732 in Germany; Joseph Wolf - M 21 Jun 1734 in Germany; Bernard Wolf - M - 1738 in Lancaster, Pennsylvania, USA; Abraham Wolf - M - 1739 in Pennsylvania, USA; Jacob Wolf - M - 1740 in Pennsylvania, USA; Anna Mary Wolf - F - 1741 in Pennsylvania, USA; Conrad Wolf - M - 1742 in Pennsylvania, USA; Henry Wolf - M 1743 in Pennsylvania, USA and Susanna Wolf - F 1744 in Pennsylvania, USA. Passenger and Immigration Lists Index, 1500s-1900s about Georg Michael Wolff: - Name: Georg Michael Wolff - Year: 1739 - Age: 44 - Estimated Birth Year: abt 1695 - Place: Pennsylvania - Family Members: - Relative Conrad 20; Child Joh. Bernhard - Source Publication Code: 1033.7 - Primary Immigrant: Wolff, Georg Michael - Annotation: Date and port of arrival. Name of ship, place of origin, and citation to original record may also be provided. Spouse and children, mentioned prior to emigration, were assumed by indexers to have accompanied emigrant. Much genealogical and historical data is also provided. - Source Bibliography: BURGERT, ANNETTE KUNSELMAN. Palatine Origins of Some Pennsylvania Pioneers. Myerstown, PA: AKB Publications, 2000. 574p. - Page: 394 George died on 6 Feb 1756 in Earl, Lancaster County, Pennsylvania, United States. He was 52 years old. Reference: [https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/105195762/george-michael-wolfe?.....
